title: Night Of Farewells
opening: Jaffar and Nino, Black Fang assassins. Befriended by Eliwood, they now join his group. That night...
Jaffar and Nino, Black Fang assassins. Although Hector cannot forget his hatred for Nergal's former henchman, Jaffar, Hector allows him to join the group, with Nino at his side. That night...

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Hey!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: It's very late. Where are you going?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: ...Jaffar.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: To Sonia?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: ...Unh.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Do you know her whereabouts?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: The mountain fortress has been discovered, so... I think she's in the other place.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: The Water Temple? ...... What about them?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I haven't told them. They're all good people, so they would know I'm not lying. And yet... I want to see Mother. I want to hear the truth from her. So...

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Nino... Sentiment will not protect you from that woman.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I know that! But she's my mother!! I'm her flesh and blood. She's the only mother I have!!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: ...That is something I cannot understand...

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Ah! I'm sorry... I didn't mean...

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: It's nothing.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Jaffar, I truly am sorry.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: I will not let you go alone. If you go, I go with you. OK?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Jaffar...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: I wanted to know where she was slipping off to in the dead of night... ...Nino...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: I agree with Jaffar. There's no way Sonia will be moved by Nino's feelings.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Are we just going to let them go?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: No, we're going to follow them right away.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Of course we are!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: What are you doing, Hector? Hurry!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Jaffar's a killer. He's slaughtered our friends. I can't forgive him. Eliwood, is all this necessary? Do we need his strength so much that we now must rescue him?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: No, that's not it. I wanted those two to live on. Their lives... They've been so hard. That's why I said what I did. My feelings were confirmed in Bern. The Black Fang is not all evil. They're being manipulated by Nergal. Some of them must be fighting against their better judgment.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Is that what you believe about Jaffar?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: I don't know. But you've seen how he behaves around Nino... He seems like a completely different person than the man we fought at the Dragon's Gate.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: I feel the same way. Hector, how about you?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: He has killed my friends. He is my enemy. No matter what happens, that will never change.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: So you'll let them die?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: That's not what I said! I want him to stay alive. He must live...so that he can suffer for all he's done! There! Satisfied?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Hector...

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: I've said my peace. I'm done. I won't do any more ranting. ......Sorry about that. Now, let's go! Hurry up, you two!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Wha--Wai-Wait up!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Let's go, Tactician. We can't let the Black Fang go unattended. It's time we turned the tables on Nergal!!

intro.speaker: Limstella
intro.line: Sonia.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Pah. Take heed how casually you call a human by name, you puppet. ...Now what do you want?

intro.speaker: Limstella
intro.line: Eliwood is alive. Lord Nergal's orders have not yet been fulfilled.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Silence, you abomination!! I know that. Though the Four Fangs are gone, I'm still here... I will finish Eliwood and his friends with my own two hands!
...Sonia! Where are you, Sonia?!

intro.speaker: Brendan
intro.line: Sonia, I must speak... Hm? Who's that?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: ...Oh, well... I suppose it's best I was done with you anyway. Hee hee... Those annoying brothers were all that prevented me from acting sooner.

intro.speaker: Brendan
intro.line: Sonia...you...

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: I got close to you so that I could take control of the Black Fang. Take a look around you. Not a familiar face to be seen, is there? I've been replacing them one by one... Hee hee. They're all Lord Nergal's puppets. His morphs!!

intro.speaker: Brendan
intro.line: So...you've betrayed me.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: You've finally noticed... You're a fool, Brendan Reed! Your own sons suspected me right from the beginning. Every minute I spent with you, every caress... It was loathsome!! It was all for Lord Nergal. All to control the Four Fangs. Now it's over. Die for me now, will you? Die for your beloved wife!

intro.speaker: Brendan
intro.line: Sonia! You inhuman monster!!!

intro.speaker: Brendan
intro.line: Aaargh... Lloyd... Linus... Forgive your...foolish...father......

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Ow... He can't just die... Has to be the Black Fang leader even to the bitter end.

intro.speaker: Limstella
intro.line: Brendan Reed... What magnificent essence. I will deliver it to Lord Nergal at once.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Be sure to tell him that it was I who killed Brendan!! ...Ooh!

intro.speaker: Limstella
intro.line: You appear to be injured. Shall I take over your duties?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Don't be ridiculous! I will never let a creature like you seize the glory that is mine! I was chosen by Lord Nergal himself! I'm a perfect being!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: I will take care of Eliwood and his companions. I! Sonia!

intro.speaker: Jan
intro.line: Com-Com...Commander... They... They're monsters......

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Uncle Jan! Is that you, Uncle?

intro.speaker: Jan
intro.line: Nino!? Why have you come back?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I...wanted to speak with Mother.

intro.speaker: Jan
intro.line: Flee this place!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Uncle?

intro.speaker: Jan
intro.line: The commander is dead! That woman--

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: What were you going to say about me?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Mother!

intro.speaker: Jan
intro.line: Aaaah...Soniaaaa!!! Uwaa... Aaaaaaaa!!!!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Wretch! I'll smoke you out later. First, Nino... You failed again, and you've tarnished my reputation.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Um... Mother...

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Shut up!!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Ah!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: A thoroughly and utterly useless little girl. If only I'd known, I would've sent you off to your true parents!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: My true...parents?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Ha ha... That's right. What can the truth hurt now? Your true family for generations was the most famed house of magic wielders in all Lycia. They alone guarded the secret of the dragons. Thirteen years ago, Lord Nergal and I stole that secret.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: My...family?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Ha ha ha! No matter how wise they were, they were only human. I held a child before me as a shield, and they were powerless to act!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: The father, the mother, and then the child I carried... After they revealed all of their secrets... And I slaughtered them with these very hands!!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I... I... I'm not your daughter?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: There were two children, a boy and a girl. One, the mother fought fiercely to save. She held her daughter tight as I killed her. That girl, Nino, was you!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: No!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: You were still a mewling little whelp, but we took you with us. Lord Nergal thought you might be useful, so he let you live. I hated the very thought of it, but it was Lord Nergal's wish that I raise you as my daughter.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: We were so wrong about you! Stupid and useless beyond all reason! A worthless piece of offal! All you were was in the way!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: So that's why you wanted her dead. You're inhuman. Your soul is black and devoid of warmth.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: I never expected to hear such things from you, Jaffar! Once, you killed without hesitation at Lord Nergal's command. What happened to the man all feared, my Angel of Death?

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Nino has changed me. I am no longer Nergal's killing engine. For Nino's sake... Sonia, you must die. And I will kill you!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Jaffar!!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Stay back. I will take care of this woman.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Aha ha ha ha ha ha!!! "Stay back"! How rich! How noble! So, shall I pass judgment on you, as the Black Fang must with traitors? Ha ha ha! I sentence you to death! Prepare to be punished!
I won't allow that!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Nino! Jaffar! Are you OK?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Bah. Look at the trouble you've caused!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: We're companions now. You mustn't forget that!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Everyone...

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Ha ha ha ha ha! Such sweet friends, Nino... Sorry to cut short your little reunion. Ha ha... I won't let you get away. To a man, you will all die!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Hm? Wha--!? Eeek!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Lyndis! Look out!! This way!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Ha ha ha... You are the sinners who hurt my Lord Nergal. I will not let you die swiftly.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Woah! This place is filling with water!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: The path vanished... This water prevents us from moving forward or back.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Nino! Jaffar! Are you all right?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Yeah! We're fine!!

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: I'll create some paths for you, so please keep coming. Of course, you can stay where you are if you like. I care not, so long as you die in pain and fear. You can't escape from the grave that's waiting for you, though.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I'm sorry, everyone! All of this, it's... It's all...my...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Nino! Calm down. I told you, didn't I? We came because we're friends. There's no need to apologize.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Lyn...

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Pathways and courtesies? I guess she's being gracious, right?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Let's defeat Sonia and sever the connection between Nergal and the Black Fang!! For a better future!

boss.speaker: Sonia
boss.line: Lord Nergal will have your quintessence! Only the chosen few will live to see the new world. Perfect people! People like me!

boss.speaker: Sonia
boss.line: It can't be... I'm...perfect... Lord Nergal said...so...

boss.speaker: Nino
boss.line: I thought for so long that you were my true mother…

boss.speaker: Sonia
boss.line: Ha ha ha! Your mother and father looked so much like you. They were so naive it made me want to vomit. I dressed in rags and entered their house with a child in my arms. They were sincerely concerned. Ha ha… Trusting a stranger is so utterly foolish. Oh, they came to regret their trust, but it was too late.

boss.speaker: Nino
boss.line: Aaahhh!!! You’re no perfect being! You’re a monster in human form! No mercy! No forgiveness!!!

boss.speaker: Sonia
boss.line: Ingrate! You owe your life to Lord Nergal! You and that girl, you’re nothing but filth! But it matters not, as long as your essence remains intact. No other part of you now has any value.

end.speaker: Jan
end.line: Dear little Nino.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Uncle Jan! I'm so glad you're safe!!

end.speaker: Jan
end.line: Yes. I didn't even fight. I just hid... I... I... I'm just a cowardly old man... When that woman killed the commander, I could do nothing...

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Father... He's dead, isn't he?... Even though I wasn't his real daughter, he treated me kindly. and yet...Moth--Sonia......

end.speaker: Jan
end.line: ......You learned the truth?

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Uh-huh.

end.speaker: Jan
end.line: I see... Let me return this to you, lass.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: A...pendant?

end.speaker: Jan
end.line: It belonged to your real mother. The commander never fully trusted Sonia. He had his agents investigate her past. He uncovered much... Like where you'd come from. He was able to speak to a woman who worked in your house. When he told her about you, she wept with joy. She asked that you be given this.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: ......I loved the Black Fang. Nergal and Sonia have ruined it, but... The Black Fang that my father and brothers made... Everyone was so kind, I thought of them as my family...

end.speaker: Jan
end.line: Mmm...mmm. That was a good time.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Uncle Jan... Thank you. The pendant, I'll cherish it.

end.speaker: Jan
end.line: Take care, lass. ...Be happy.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Goodbye, Uncle. See you again. Someday...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Have you said your farewells?

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Yes. Uh...thanks. you all came and... told me that we're friends. ......It made me happy. Can I travel with you?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Of course! Right, Eliwood?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: If that's what you'd like, we'd be happy to have you. Will you come and help us?

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Yeah! I'll do my best! I promise! Jaffar, too!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: We should be getting back to camp. We've an early start tomorrow.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: You're right. We should head out as soon as it's light. The Shrine of Seals awaits!

end.speaker: Limstella
end.line: Sonia.

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: ......Lea--Leave me... ...accursed puppet... Lord Nergal... ...Aah...help...me.

end.speaker: Limstella
end.line: Puppets have no essence to harvest. You no longer have any use to Lord Nergal...

end.speaker: Sonia
end.line: What!? ...What...did... What are you...I am human......
